ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and Thamud as well, sparing none of them,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And Thamud, and did not leave them,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and Thamud, leaving no trace of them,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And destroyed the tribe of Thamud, not sparing anyone?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And Thamud. He spared none of them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And Samood, so He spared not
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and Thamood, and He did not spare them,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And (the tribe of) Thamud He spared not;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And that Thamud! He left not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And the Thamud nor gave them a lease of perpetual life.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And Thamud (people). He spared none of them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And Thamud - and He did not spare [them] -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [53:51] and Thamūd (wa-Thamūda: may be declined, as the name of their forefather, or left as a diptote, being the name of the tribe; it is a supplement to ‘Ādan) sparing not, a single one of them;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And (the tribe of) Thamud) the folk of Salih (He spared not) a single one of them; 625
